$ref.description: Path to content that replaces the $ref

actions.description: Reports from test scenarios and test suites comprising the test suite for this report

capability_evaluations.description: List of capabilities defined in this test suite, evaluated for each participant.

documentation_url.description: URL at which this test suite is described

start_time.description: Time at which the test suite started

successful.description: True iff test suite completed normally with no failed checks

end_time.description: Time at which the test suite completed
